iiv.data

Class LinearCoordinateMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.data.AffineCoordinateMap
      • iiv.data.LinearCoordinateMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoordinateMap, CNUFileObject, iiVScriptable

    public class LinearCoordinateMap
extends AffineCoordinateMap
implements CNUFileObject
    Class that converts coordinates into Talairach space based on a simple linear mapping.
    Since:
    iiV1.0
    See Also:
    CNUDisplay

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface iiv.data.CoordinateMap

        DEGREES, DEGREES_2_RADIANS, METERS, MILLIMETERS, PIXELS, RADIANS, RADIANS_2_DEGREES, TALAIRACH_ACPC_CENTER, TALAIRACH_ACPC_HEIGHT, TALAIRACH_ACPC_LENGTH, TALAIRACH_FRONT_AC_LENGTH, TALAIRACH_HEIGHT, TALAIRACH_LENGTH, TALAIRACH_WIDTH, UNKNOWN_UNITS

      • writeMap

        public static void writeMap(CNUFile cnufile,
                            Object cd,
                            LinearCoordinateMap lcm)
                     throws IOException
        Writes a linear coordinate map to a file.
        Parameters:
        cnufile - file to write to
        cd - Continue dialog to invoke if file already exists. If null no write over premitted, if not null and not a ContinueDialog writes over with no prompt.
        lcm - linear coordinate map to save
        Throws:
        IOException
